# AnchorUpdate.Event.updated

**Case**

An event that occurs when an existing anchor updates data.

## Declaration

```swift
case updated
```

## Inspecting anchor update events

- **AnchorUpdate.Event.added**: An event that occurs when ARKit starts tracking an anchor.
- **AnchorUpdate.Event.removed**: An event that occurs when ARKit stops tracking an anchor.

items.description: An event that occurs when ARKit starts tracking an anchor.
